content: no holes baby blanket amended version by linda davie i used 5 5mm hook 5 uk i us 8ply yarn aust dk uk light worsted us finished size approx 40cms x 60cms abbreviations us terms fdsc foundation single_crochet chain- chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet st - stitch row 1 work 50 stitches in fdsc chain 2 row 2 half_double_crochet to end ch1 50sts row 3 1sc in the first stitch 1 double_crochet in next stitch then alternate 1 single_crochet in the next st 1 double_crochet in the next st all of the way to the end chain 1 turn 50sts repeat row 3 until you have reached your desired length the 1sc in this row should sit on top of the double_crochet from the previous row and the following 1dc from this row should sit on top of the single_crochet from the previous row across the whole row chain 2 turn to finish off work 1 row of half_double_crochet chain 1 turn and work 1 row of single_crochet finish off and sew in ends
